author: A_Brickset_user
title: A simple set, but still tons of fun
review: I think this was one of the very first sets I ever had.  The bicycle was one of the coolest lego items; I loved that piece so much!  It's a simple set, really easy to make, and it's definitely a classic.  Overall, a really nice little bike set.

author: bjorndeheer
title: Cycle Fix-It Shop
review:
This set is one of my favorite small buildings. I started a whole chain of Cycle Fix-It Shops in my Town.
One of the nice things of this set is the preprinted sign(I don't like stickers)
What is missing in the shop is a computer(like in set 6373)

author: AETerry
title: Cycle Fix-It Shop Review
review:
In many ways, this set due to the yellow bricks has me think of it as a scaled down version of set 6373 Motorcycle Shop. But that's not really true. While similiar, they're very different.

 

6373 is a Motorcycle Sales place, whereas this set is a place to bring your bicycle or motorcycle in for repairs. It's one of the few rare sets I have that comes with an actual bicycle. You get two motorcycles and two minifigures. There is a small shop to the side of the repair garage and preprinted signs, that is non-stickers that are cool.

 

It's a fun little shop and adds a lot of great character to any Lego City or Town.

author: qmtAFOL
title: Very Versatile Little Set!
review: I always enjoyed this set. I consider it one of the more versatile ones. I bought several and using the same layout, turned them into a post office and ice cream / snack shop. Wonderful addition for any town.
